/usr/local/cuda-12.6/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler  "--generate-code=arch=compute_80,code=[compute_80,sm_80]" -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink --options-file CMakeFiles/UnitTestBVH.dir/deviceObjects1.rsp -o CMakeFiles/UnitTestBVH.dir/cmake_device_link.o --options-file CMakeFiles/UnitTestBVH.dir/deviceLinkLibs.rsp
